scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Michael
scrape.text:
Weak, unrealistic story propped up by the gimmick of telling it through a "dinner". You can see the ending coming from about midway through the book, yet, like a real dinner engagement you are stuck at the table with these miserable people until the bitter end.
I guess a lot of people like this sort of book huddling from the reviews, but this was not my thing at all.
